channel.title: Stackable food command [508]

item.title: Stackable food command [508]
item.dc:creator: @99range_k0 99range k0
item.description:
@99range_k0 wrote:

Ok I want it to when you type ::food you get 1000 noted manta rays. heres my code so far

if(cmd[0].equals("food")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 392, 1000); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Theres some food"); }

however when I enter it in game it fills my whole inventory up with noted food.
Heres an example of what I mean.
http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/7169/noted.th.jpg
how can I make it where it only takes up 1 slot in the inventory and has all 1k manta rays??

Read full topic
